Ingredients.2: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.3: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans sauerkraut, or to taste

Ingredients.4: 3 cups water, or more as needed

Ingredients.6: 1  apple - peeled, cored, and finely chopped

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place pork roast in a large roasting pan. Season with salt and black pepper. Mix sauerkraut, water, onion, and apple together in a large bowl. Pour sauerkraut mixture over roast.

Directions.3: Bake roast in the preheated oven until heated through, about 1 hour. Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Continue to cook roast until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), adding water if sauerkraut mixture looks dry, about 2 hours more.

Directions.4: Remove roast from oven and allow to rest in a warm area before slicing, about 10 minutes.
